comments.name: Chad Jones
comments.content:
What I really want is a simple system for coordinating textual reading study groups which allows for taking small local groups and incorporating a larger external group? Or starting a group together and continuing remotely. Consider that Shoghi Effendi's summer schools were 3-6 weeks in length. That is actually enough time to study book But modern summer schools are 3-6 DAYS!! 

How the heck are people going to master the Dawn-Breakers in 3 days??  

But what if we can start a Dawn-Breakers class together over a weekend and then continue virtually for 3-6 weeks from home? 

The same group the same friends the same class started locally but coordinated online
